originalText.text: Very impressed with my barber. That real Harlem brotherhood I could feel all through the haircut, B.

text.text: Very impressed with my barber. That real Harlem brotherhood I could feel all through the haircut, B.

originalText.text: This is a very clean, comfortable barber shop. I take my 7-year-old autistic son every week. Eric does a great job of making him feel comfortable & he even sits for intricate designs. It's a great location; parking is ok. Eric is usually there very early every day, so that's nice too. Highly recommend!

text.text: This is a very clean, comfortable barber shop. I take my 7-year-old autistic son every week. Eric does a great job of making him feel comfortable & he even sits for intricate designs. It's a great location; parking is ok. Eric is usually there very early every day, so that's nice too. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: See Eric in the first chair right in front of the window. He does exactly what you request but also advises. His sense of humor is also a plus. I take my 82-years old dad here just to see Eric because he is skilled at meeting my dad's need for a consistently single classic cut. Eric is old enough to respect tradition and young enough to deliver on current cuts! It's a great combination in a barber!

text.text: See Eric in the first chair right in front of the window. He does exactly what you request but also advises. His sense of humor is also a plus. I take my 82-years old dad here just to see Eric because he is skilled at meeting my dad's need for a consistently single classic cut. Eric is old enough to respect tradition and young enough to deliver on current cuts! It's a great combination in a barber!

originalText.text: The Guy in the front on the right seemed friendly and understood what I needed as he was informed I was going on vacation and haven’t had a haircut in months. He appeared to be the manager or owner. He directed to an older dude seated in the middle, who I was already skeptical of. Considering it was my first time I took a chance, long story short he was RUDE, had no patience for what I asked for and he CUT MY DREAD!  If you do utilize this place i would consider using the younger guys as they’re understanding of trendy haircuts

originalText.text: It's better to go down in a plane crash than to have your haircut at this establishment. I was cut not one but three times by the clippers the barber was using when he dropped the comb he was using he just picked it off the floor and continued to use it. See a comb sterilizing container anywhere in the place. And when he opened up his drawer in his station to look for an attachment for the Clippers it look like a junk drawer in a garage I was mortified I left there with a hacked up haircut cut on my neck that were so obvious when I was walking down the street a complete stranger asked me if I was okay because blood was dripping from the back of my neck. In for my trouble and pain he has the nerve to charge me $22 bucks. If you have any concern for your personal safety I would implore you to never go to this establishment.
